trans-unit.source: Provides a container for Windows toolbar objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Windows 工具列物件的容器 (Container)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is the base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> 是 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> 的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its associated classes in new Windows Forms applications to create toolbars that can have a Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, or custom appearance and behavior, all with or without themes, and with support for overflow and run-time item reordering.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>中新的 Windows Form 應用程式建立工具列包含 Windows XP、 Office、 Internet Explorer 中，或自訂外觀和行為都可以透過或佈景主題，而不支援溢位和執行階段項目及其相關類別重新排列。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls also offer a rich design-time experience that includes in-place activation and editing, custom layout, and sharing of horizontal or vertical space within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> 控制項也提供豐富的設計階段經驗，包括在就地啟用和編輯、 自訂配置和共用的水平或垂直空間內指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> class provides many members that manage painting, mouse and keyboard input, and drag-and-drop functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>類別會提供許多可管理繪製、 滑鼠和鍵盤輸入，以及拖放功能的成員。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class to gain even more control and customizability over the painting and layout style of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls on a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager>類別，以取得更多的控制和自訂的所有繪製和版面配置樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>Windows Form 上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: 下列項目專為緊密地與這兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>中所有方向。

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control:
trans-unit.target: 它們是在設計階段的預設可用的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控制項：

trans-unit.source: You can join <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and merge <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls with each other.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控制項內指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>和合併<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>彼此的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> rather than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> for Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>而不是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>多重文件介面 (MDI) 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not participate in the tab order unless it is absolutely positioned rather than being docked or in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>無法享有定位順序中，除非絕對定位而停駐或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> class to host any other Windows Forms control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>類別，以裝載中的任何其他 Windows Form 控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is double buffered, taking advantage of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> setting.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>為雙重緩衝，利用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer>設定。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> 會取代並且將功能加入至之前版本的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> 控制項；不過，也可以選擇保留 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>，以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 以及供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a Windows Forms, adding items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, and adding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>至 Windows Form 中，加入項目至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，並加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> class with the specified array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />s.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的指定陣列，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drag-and-drop and item reordering are handled through events that you implement.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出拖放和項目的重新排列是否透過您實作的事件來加以處理。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to control drag-and-drop and item reordering through events that you implement; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示透過您所實作的事件來控制拖放和項目的重新排列，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> property to `false` to respond to drag-and-drop behavior you have defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType> events.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A>屬性`true`並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>屬性`false`拖放行為，您已定義在回應<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> to `false` and set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` to cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> class to handle drag-and-drop and item reordering automatically.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A>至`false`並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>至`true`造成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>類別處理拖放和項目的自動重新排列。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` for two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects to allow dragging of items from one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the other.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>至`true`兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>允許拖曳的項目從某個物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>之間。

trans-unit.source: To enable the default drag-and-drop, the ALT key must be pressed during the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用預設拖放，必須在拖曳作業期間按下 ALT 鍵。

trans-unit.source: Setting both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 設定同時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>至`true`擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder" /> are both set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder" /> 都會設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示拖放動作和項目的重新排序是否由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 類別私下處理。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />, and other types can be combined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否可以結合多個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> 和其他類型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if combining of types is allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允許結合類型，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A> property to enable multiple-document interface (MDI) children to combine their respective menus in the MDI parent.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A>屬性，讓結合其個別功能表的 MDI 父系中的多重文件介面 (MDI) 子系。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the edges of the container to which a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is bound and determines how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 繫結容器的目的邊緣，並決定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 隨其父代調整大小的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A>屬性來定義如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>其父控制項調整大小時，會自動調整大小。

trans-unit.source: Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 錨定在其父控制項的控制項，可確保，錨定的邊緣仍保留在相同位置相對於邊緣父控制項的父控制項調整大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>屬性互斥。

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個可以設定一次，最後一個設定的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否自動調整大小以顯示其全部內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control adjusts its width to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項會配合內容調整寬度，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> to `false` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is embedded in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> panel, the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> are not translated when you move the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a different panel of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>至`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>嵌入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> 面板的界限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>移動時，不會轉譯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>到不同的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>。

trans-unit.source: To translate the bounds properly, synchronize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged> event, check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property, and resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 若要正確地解譯界限，同步處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged>事件，檢查的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A>屬性，並調整大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>屬性屬於映像處理的各個層面。

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控制項設定這些屬性直接或藉由設定執行時間-僅限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 影像縮放比例取決於屬性中的互動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> 小數位數的映像的組合所決定最終映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>設定和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（預設值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>，沒有影像的縮放比例就會發生，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>，都沒有映像，也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>調整，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A>屬性不支援透明的色彩，除非`SupportsTransparentBackColor`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType>設`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A>屬性是環境的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A>做為其父系<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>預設。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>類別或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" />屬性在衍生類別中，使用基底類別的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" />屬性擴充的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否則，您必須提供所有的實作。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to override both the <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> property; you can override only one if needed.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要覆寫兩個<see langword="get" />和<see langword="set" />存取子<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" />屬性; 您可以覆寫只能有一個必要。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding context for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的繫結內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> returns a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for all data-bound controls contained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>傳回單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>所包含的所有資料繫結控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> keeps all controls that are bound to the same data source synchronized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>會保留所有的控制項繫結至相同的資料來源同步處理。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> specifies the item in the underlying list that all data-bound controls point to.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>所有資料繫結控制項所指向基礎清單中指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and assigning it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>並將它指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>屬性，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" />屬性在衍生類別中，使用基底類別的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" />屬性擴充的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否則，您必須提供所有的實作。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to override both the <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> property; you can override only one, if needed.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要覆寫兩個<see langword="get" />和<see langword="set" />存取子<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" />屬性; 您可以覆寫其中之一，如有需要。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> can be sent to an overflow menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否可以將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 中的項目傳送到溢位功能表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to send <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> items to an overflow menu; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 項目傳送到溢位功能表，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CanOverflow%2A> property to `true` to send a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> item to an overflow menu when the item's content exceeds the width of the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CanOverflow%2A>屬性`true`傳送<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>溢位功能表項目的內容超過工具列的寬度時的項目。

trans-unit.source: If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the ToolStrip Items Collection Editor to manage this situation.
trans-unit.target: 如果有數多於可以顯示在表單上的溢位項目，，使用 ToolStrip 項目集合編輯器來管理這種情況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CanOverflow%2A> property.

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定將滑鼠指標移至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上方時所顯示的游標。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> that represents the cursor to display when the mouse pointer is over the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" />，代表將滑鼠指標移至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上方時所顯示的游標。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Cursor%2A> property to get or set a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor> used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Cursor%2A>屬性來取得或設定特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Cursor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Cursor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CursorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CursorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `ToolStrip1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名為`ToolStrip1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CursorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CursorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the docking location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, indicating which borders are docked to the container.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的停駐位置，表示哪些框線要停駐到容器上。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Top" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Top" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the default direction in which a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control is displayed relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控制項相對於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的預設顯示方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultDropDownDirection%2A> property to get or set where a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> control appears in relation to its container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultDropDownDirection%2A>屬性來取得或設定其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>相對於其容器的控制項就會出現。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultDropDownDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultDropDownDirection%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default spacing, in pixels, between the sizing grip and the edges of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的調整大小底框和邊緣之間的預設間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> values representing the spacing, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 值，表示以像素為單位的間距。

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing, in pixels, between the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 內容的內部間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value of <c>(0, 0, 1, 0)</c>.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />值<c>（0，0，1，0）</c>。

trans-unit.source: By default, the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> are padded one pixel from the right edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to prevent the right border from painting over a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> that is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>會從右邊緣的則會填滿一個像素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>若要避免上繪製的右框線<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，為靠右對齊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> by default.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示預設是否顯示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的預設 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> when it is initially created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A>屬性代表<xref:System.Drawing.Size>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>最初建立時。

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> by setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreferredSize%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整大小的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>藉由設定其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreferredSize%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: To maintain better performance, do not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要維持較佳的效能，請勿設定<xref:System.Drawing.Size>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>其建構函式中。

trans-unit.source: Instead, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize" /> property in a derived class, it is preferable to return a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> with the preferred dimensions rather than overriding all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize" />衍生類別中的屬性，最好是傳回<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />慣用的維度，而不是覆寫所有的實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the subset of items that are currently displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, including items that are automatically added into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上的項目子集，包括自動加入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 中的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> representing the items that are currently displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />，代表目前顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上的項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> property to access only those items that are currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>屬性來存取目前顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: These are the items that are not currently in an overflow menu.
trans-unit.target: 這些是目前不在溢位功能表中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection to retrieve all the items of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>要擷取的所有項目集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current display rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 擷取目前的顯示矩形。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> area for item layout.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，代表項目配置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 區域。

trans-unit.source: The display rectangle is the area where you lay out items.
trans-unit.target: 顯示矩形是配置項目的區域。

trans-unit.source: The position and dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> display rectangle change during automatic scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 位置和維度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>顯示矩形變更時自動捲動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 <see langword="Dispose" /> 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定停駐在其父控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 框線，並決定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 隨其父代重新調整大小的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Top" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Top" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>屬性來定義如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>其父控制項調整大小時，會自動調整大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left>導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>其父控制項的左邊緣對齊本身，並會隨著調整父控制項調整大小。

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: 控制項停駐在其疊置順序，也就是表單的 z 軸 （深度） 沿著表單上控制項的視覺化圖層。

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可以停駐於父容器的某一邊或可停駐的邊緣和填滿的父容器。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> can be repositioned within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and across <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>s.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控制項處於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>可以內重新定位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>和透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>s。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> property is ignored, and if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A> property is `false`, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> grows as items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>屬性會被忽略，而且如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A>屬性是`false`，大小為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>中加入項目會隨著<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not participate in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不會參與的索引標籤順序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>屬性互斥。

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個可以設定一次，最後一個設定的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者停止拖曳 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 控制項時。

trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BeginDrag>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.EndDrag>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font used to display text in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示控制項的文字所用的字型。

trans-unit.source: The current default font.
trans-unit.target: 目前的預設字型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> representing the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，代表前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ForeColor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ForeColor" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ForeColorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ForeColorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `ToolStrip1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名為`ToolStrip1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ForeColorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ForeColorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the child control at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定位置的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定座標的子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GetChildAtPointSkip" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GetChildAtPointSkip" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定座標的子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item located at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 傳回位於指定位置上的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> at which to search for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要於其上搜尋 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item located at the specified point in the client area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 工作區中指定點的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> at the specified location, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: 指定位置上的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />；如果找不到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal coordinate, in pixels, from the left edge of the client area.
trans-unit.target: 從工作區左邊緣算起的水平座標 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The vertical coordinate, in pixels, from the top edge of the client area.
trans-unit.target: 從工作區上邊緣算起的垂直座標 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item located at the specified x- and y-coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> client area.
trans-unit.target: 傳回位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 工作區之指定 X 和 Y 座標的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> located at the specified location, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />；如果找不到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that is the reference point from which to begin the retrieval of the next item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />，要開始擷取下一個項目的參考點。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection" /> that specifies the direction to move.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection" /> 值，指定要移動的方向。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the next <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> from the specified reference point and moving in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的參考點擷取下一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />，並往指定的方向移動。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that is specified by the <paramref name="start" /> parameter and is next in the order as specified by the <paramref name="direction" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />，其為 <paramref name="start" /> 參數所指定，而且為 <paramref name="direction" /> 參數所指定的順序中的下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GetNextItem%2A> method to get the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GetNextItem%2A>方法來取得下一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection> enumeration coordinates with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection>列舉型別會與協調<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The specified value of the <paramref name="direction" /> parameter is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="direction" /> 參數的指定值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> move handle.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 移動控制軸的方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Possible values are <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle.Horizontal" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle.Vertical" />.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle.Horizontal" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle.Vertical" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space around the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> move handle.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 移動控制軸周圍的間距。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />, which represents the spacing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />，代表間距。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripMargin%2A> property to get or set the space around the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> move handle.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripMargin%2A>屬性來取得或設定周圍的空間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>移動控點。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding?displayProperty=nameWithType> can take individual values for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, you can adjust the space around the move handle as preferred.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding?displayProperty=nameWithType>最需要的個別值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>，您可以調整為慣用的移動控制軸周圍的空間。

trans-unit.source: The margin can even be off the edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 邊界甚至可以是關閉的邊緣<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripMargin%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripMargin%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the boundaries of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> move handle.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 移動控制軸的界限。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, representing the move handle boundaries.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 類型的物件，代表移動控制軸的界限。

trans-unit.source: If the boundaries are not visible, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripRectangle" /> property returns <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果看不到界限，則 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripRectangle" /> 屬性會傳回 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripRectangle%2A> property to get boundaries for painting, hit testing, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripRectangle%2A>屬性來取得繪製的界限、 點擊測試，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> move handle is visible or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示或隱藏 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 移動控制軸。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Visible" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Visible" />。

trans-unit.source: In a stack layout, make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> movable by putting it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and ensuring that its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Visible>.
trans-unit.target: 在堆疊配置中，讓<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>可移動放入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>並確保其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Visible>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> has children; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 具有子系，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties" /> class, which provides basic properties for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties" /> 類別的執行個體，提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar" /> 的基本屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list that contains the image displayed on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像清單，其中包含顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 項目上的影像。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> 類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>屬性屬於映像處理的各個層面。

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控制項設定這些屬性直接或藉由設定執行時間-僅限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 影像縮放比例取決於屬性中的互動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> 小數位數的映像的組合所決定最終映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>設定和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（預設值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>，沒有影像的縮放比例就會發生，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>，都沒有映像，也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>調整，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in pixels, of an image used on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上的影像大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> value representing the size of the image, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 值，代表影像的大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 16 x 16 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 16 x 16 像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> property to control the default size of an image.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>屬性，即可控制映像的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit> to make the size of the image on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> to automatically adjust to fit on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> while retaining the original image proportions.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>影像的大小，使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>自動調整來容納<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>同時保留原始的映像比例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>屬性屬於映像處理的各個層面。

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控制項設定這些屬性直接或藉由設定執行時間-僅限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 影像縮放比例取決於屬性中的互動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> 小數位數的映像的組合所決定最終映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>設定和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（預設值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>，沒有影像的縮放比例就會發生，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>，都沒有映像，也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>調整，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user is currently moving the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> from one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> to another.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示使用者目前是否正在將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 從某個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 移到另一個。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is currently moving the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> from one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> to another; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者目前正在將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 從某個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 移到另一個，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 是否為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的字元。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the item recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 判斷字元是否為此項目所能識別的輸入字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character should be sent directly to the item and not preprocessed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元應直接傳送至這個項目而不前置處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A> method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A>視窗訊息來判斷是否應該前置處理過或直接寄給指定的輸入的字元前置處理期間會呼叫方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A> method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A>方法會傳回`true`，指定的字元直接寄給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果該方法會傳回`false`，字元會前置處理，並只傳送給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>如果它不由前置處理階段。

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.
trans-unit.target: 前置處理的字元包括檢查的字元是否另一個控制項的助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是標準輸入按鍵或需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的按鍵是標準輸入按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the items that belong to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />, representing all the elements contained by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 類型的物件，代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 包含的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection to retrieve all the items that have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, not just the items that are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>要擷取已加入的所有項目集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，不只會顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: An item remains in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection even if it is an overflow item and is therefore not currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 項目會維持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>即使它是溢位項目，因此目前可見的集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> property to retrieve only the items that are currently displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>屬性，以擷取目前顯示在項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將集合的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the layout of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is complete.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的配置完成時。

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: 當項目無法納入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，溢位按鈕就會自動出現。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>屬性設定會決定項目是否要出現在溢位區域一律，如有需要或永遠不會。

trans-unit.source: Inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: 檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>事件，以判斷項目是否已放在主要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，溢位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，或如果它目前未顯示完全。

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.Never>.
trans-unit.target: 項目不會顯示原因的常見原因是此項目，不適合在主要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>及其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.Never>。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />，代表配置引擎介面所傳回的快取配置引擎。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets layout scheme characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定配置方式的特性。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings" />，代表配置方式的特性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> lays out the items collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 如何配置項目集合。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The possible values are <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.StackWithOverflow" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.HorizontalStackWithOverflow" />, and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.VerticalStackWithOverflow" />.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.StackWithOverflow" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.HorizontalStackWithOverflow" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.VerticalStackWithOverflow" />。

trans-unit.source: The sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to one of the overflow values.
trans-unit.target: 除非也設定，將不會顯示調整大小底框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>溢位值的其中一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>，將不會顯示調整大小底框。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.OnVisibleChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.OnVisibleChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.OnVisibleChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.OnVisibleChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.OnVisibleChanged(System.EventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.OnVisibleChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 的方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation.Horizontal" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation.Horizontal" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that is the overflow button for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> with overflow enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />，它會在啟用溢位時做為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的溢位按鈕。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton" /> with its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment" /> set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Right" /> and its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" /> value set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.Never" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton" /> 類型的物件，其 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment" /> 設定為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Right" />，且其 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" /> 值設定為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.Never" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> move handle is painted.
trans-unit.target: 發生於繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 移動控制軸時。
