trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.PaintGrip> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.PaintGrip>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `ToolStrip1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名為`ToolStrip1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.PaintGrip> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.PaintGrip>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: 由參考所傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，代表要處理的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 處理命令按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元已由控制項處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: for the immediate caller and inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 直接呼叫端和繼承的類別呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: 處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鍵已由控制項處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A> method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A>在處理對話方塊字元，例如 TAB、 RETURN、 逸出，和方向鍵前置處理的訊息呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 只有當呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A>方法表示控制項未處理的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A> simply sends the character to the parent control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A>只傳送至父控制項的字元<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey%2A>方法或傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Forms 應用程式或 ActiveX 控制項中裝載控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method in a derived class, a control should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" />方法在衍生類別中的，控制項應該傳回<see langword="true" />以表示它具有處理金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" /> method should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 針對該控制項，呼叫基底類別的結果不會處理識別碼<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" />方法應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的字元。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 處理助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已將字元當成助憶鍵處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessMnemonic%2A> method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessMnemonic%2A>呼叫方法，可讓控制項處理助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: This method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應該決定控制項是否處於處理助憶鍵的狀態，以及指定的字元是否表示助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法通常會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來判斷指定的字元是否符合控制項的文字中的助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: This default implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessMnemonic%2A> method simply returns `false`, to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessMnemonic%2A>方法只會傳回`false`，指出控制項是否有任何的助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> used to customize the look and feel of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" />，用來自訂 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的外觀和風格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> used to customize the look and feel of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" />，用來自訂 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的外觀和風格。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class to customize the look and feel of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> that does not have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>類別來自訂外觀與風格，任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>沒有視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: To do this, derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, assign it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A> property, and call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>，將它指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A>屬性，並呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來表示的視覺化樣式設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>將會使用。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify a professional rendering style, a default system rendering style, or a style managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來指定專業轉譯樣式、 為預設系統呈現的樣式或由受管理的樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Controls the return location of the focus.
trans-unit.target: 控制焦點的傳回位置。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RestoreFocus%2A> method to control where the focus returns to when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TabStop%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RestoreFocus%2A>方法來控制焦點時傳回的何處<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TabStop%2A>屬性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 以指定要選取控制項的方向，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to move forward in the tab order; <see langword="false" /> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 會在定位順序中向前移動。<see langword="false" /> 會在定位順序中向後移動。

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: 啟動子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性指定定位順序中要選取控制項的方向。

trans-unit.source: The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls.
trans-unit.target: `directed`和`forward`容器樣式控制項使用的參數。

trans-unit.source: When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select.
trans-unit.target: 當`directed`參數設定為`true`、`forward`參數進行評估以判斷哪一個控制項來選取。

trans-unit.source: When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.
trans-unit.target: 當`forward`設為`true`，定位順序中的下一個控制項已選取; 當`false`，選取先前的控制項定位順序中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Select%2A> method activates the control if the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.Selectable?displayProperty=nameWithType> style bit is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Select%2A>方法啟動控制項，如果控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.Selectable?displayProperty=nameWithType>樣式位元會設為`true`、 它包含在另一個控制項和所有其父控制項都是可見並已啟用。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 位置的 X 和 Y 工作區座標 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Anchors a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to a particular place on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 錨定至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="item" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is not the owner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> referred to by the <paramref name="item" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 不是 <paramref name="item" /> 參數所參考的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 之擁有人。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent" /> property is to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 要變更其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent" /> 屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that is the parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> referred to by the <c>item</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />，其為 <c>item</c> 參數所參考之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父代。

trans-unit.source: Enables you to change the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您變更 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.SetItemParent%2A> property when creating a custom layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.SetItemParent%2A>時建立的自訂版面配置引擎的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 為可見，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value that sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to the specified visibility state.
trans-unit.target: 擷取值，這個值會將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 設定為指定的可視性狀態。

trans-unit.source: You would typically override this method to change the visibility behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您通常會覆寫此方法以變更控制項的可見性行為。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ToolTips are to be displayed on <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 項目上顯示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if ToolTips are to be displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果會顯示工具提示則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A> property to determine whether ToolTips are displayed for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A>屬性來判斷是否要針對顯示工具提示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example turns off the automatic <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> text for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> and sets custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> text.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會關閉自動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>和設定自訂<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>文字。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.AutoToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.AutoToolTip%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> stretches from end to end in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 是否會在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 中的兩端之間自動縮放。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> stretches from end to end in its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 會在其 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 中的兩端之間自動縮放，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A> property to get or set whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> automatically fills its container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A>屬性來取得或設定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>自動填滿其容器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示使用者是否可以使用 TAB 鍵將焦點提供給 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 中的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can give the focus to an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> using the TAB key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者可以使用 TAB 鍵將焦點提供給 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 中的項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下 TAB 鍵時，要將輸入的焦點設定到下一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>定位順序中。

trans-unit.source: Controls with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 控制與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>屬性值為`false`未被納入的定位順序中的控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate the tab order by changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value for controls in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由變更管理 索引標籤順序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>控制項集合中的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TabStop%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TabStop%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction in which to draw text on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上繪製文字的方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection.Horizontal" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection.Horizontal" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A> property to get or set the direction of the display text of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A>屬性來取得或設定的顯示文字的方向<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> itself, in which case the setting will apply to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> you add to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A> property differently for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>本身，在此情況下的設定將套用至每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，或者您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A>屬性以不同的方式為每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.TextDirection%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 控制項的字串。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties" /> class, which provides basic properties for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties" /> 類別的執行個體，提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar" /> 的基本屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 處理 Windows 訊息。

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 所有訊息都會都傳送至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>方法之後被篩透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> 方法完全對應於 Windows `WindowProc` 函式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何處理 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱`WindowProc`函式在 Windows 平台 SDK 參考的文件位於 MSDN library http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method to handle operating system messages identified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>方法以處理作業系統訊息中識別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>結構。

trans-unit.source: The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active.
trans-unit.target: WM_ACTIVATEAPP 作業系統訊息是在此範例中了解當另一個應用程式無法成為使用中處理。

trans-unit.source: For information about the available <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.LParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.WParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values, see the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關可用資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.LParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.WParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值，請參閱位於 MSDN library 的 Platform SDK 文件參考http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: Actual constant values can be found in the windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available on MSDN.
trans-unit.target: 實際的常數值可以找到也會提供在 MSDN 上 Platform SDK （Core SDK > 一節） 下載中所包含的 windows.h 標頭檔中。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting controls should call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method to process any messages that they do not handle.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的控制項，應該呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />方法來處理未處理任何訊息。
